data.description:
Dance Dash is the definitive FULL BODY TRACKING game, AI powered by BodyLink (beta) camera tracking streaming, with our FREE app for your mobile device. Fully compatible with Quest 2 & 3 standalone.
# **ðŸ”—BodyLink (beta): Your Gateway to Full Body TrackingðŸ•º**
{433447386102396}

Stomp the beats in this pulse-pounding, full body sensory symphony on your Quest Headset! Craft your own rhythm, groove to community maps, music, and mods. FREE TRIAL.

# **ðŸ’ƒBUST A MOVE**
{775062488145996}

Dance Dash features intuitive mechanics like ducking, dodging, jumping, slapping, and especially shuffling, making it easy to play and highly engaging. Choreograph your most treasured tunes, and let the world know how you rock!

# **ðŸ’«DD Editor to Create, Share, and ConnectðŸŒŽ**
{807231754337921}

Dive into the DD Editor (separate application), to create your own beatmaps for endless gameplay. Learn cool moves from influencersâ€™ videos, or play original music videos in-game

Join our vibrant community of members from countries all over the world: discord.gg/dancedash!

Support: dancedash@rebuffreality.com

changelog.change_log:
Removed some 3rd party plugin
Changed Android beta link to public google play page

Fix a potential crash for mod.io
Great reduced mod.io stutters

- Added gaze & pinch control (VisionPro style >â–½<)
- Added search functionality for mod.io UI
- Improved mod.io page UI
- Re-arranged some UI elements

- Added an entry for Android beta application
- Added an option to "Turn off MISS sound effect"
- Optimized the logic of album selection when entering the game
- Optimized the interface of Mod.io, now sorted by Trending by default
- Now you can enter the game without holding the controllers.
- Modified the calibration prompts to better accommodate the use of hand tracking.

New Features:
- VideoLink for playing youtube links from beatmap / mod.io
- Reorganized the interface content, optimized the interface effects
- Supported negative offset values for the beatmap

Fixes:
- Fixed the issue where the foot node occasionally flies to the face when using BodyLink Phone FBT in poor network conditions
- Removed redundant popup logic

- Enabled 90hz for Quest 3
- Fixed Quest 3 performance bug

Added Song List Filter & Sorting Order
Added BodyLink (Phone FBT) support
Added hand tracking support  (Use with BodyLink to play without controllers)
New Official BeatMap: Broken Promises
Resolution bump for all devices
Fixed Some UI & Animation Bugs
Improved performance: The game now runs in 80Hz mode and the framerate is more stable.

- Better Light Animations
- New Floor Effect That Changes With Multiplier Level
- Support Adjusting Shoe Binding Position
- 3 Levels of Play Space Scale Options
- Variouse UI & Visual Fixes
